installdll:
Install specified dll in specified container
Number of parameters: 1
Parameter description: dll name or number from the Internet DLL tool, such as 7012 for xolehlp.dll Platform: 2003 Architecture: 64
stopdll:
Disallow specified dll/exe from running
Number of parameters: 1
Parameter description: dll/exe name, such as example.exe
installfont:
Install specified font to specified container
Number of parameters: 1
Parameter description: Number in font store, such as 5 for msyhbd.ttc
installsparkcorefont:
Install 'Microsoft Core Fonts' from Spark App Store
Number of parameters: 0
Parameter description: None
installmono:
Install latest version of mono to specified container
Number of parameters: 0
Parameter description: None
installgecko:
Install latest version of gecko to specified container
Number of parameters: 0
Parameter description: None
installvcpp:
Install specified VCPP runtime library to specified container
Number of parameters: 1
Parameter description: Number in Visual Studio C++ installation tool, such as 10 for Visual Studio C++ 2015, 2017, 2019 and 2022 X64
installnet:
Install specified .net framework runtime library to specified container
Number of parameters: 1
Parameter description: Number in .net framework installation tool, such as 3 for .net framework 4.5.1 Offline Installer
installmsxml:
Install specified MSXML runtime library to specified container
Number of parameters: 1
Parameter description: Number in MSXML installation tool, such as 1 for MSXML 4.0 SP3
echo:
Display content
Number of parameters: ≥1
Parameter description: Content to display
info:
Display information dialog
Number of parameters: 2
Parameter description: Title + Display content
error:
Display error dialog
Number of parameters: 2
Parameter description: Title + Display content
warning:
Display warning dialog
Number of parameters: 2
Parameter description: Title + Display content
exit:
Exit program
Number of parameters: 0
Parameter description: None
bat:
Execute cmd command in Wine container (on Windows will execute command in system)
Number of parameters: ≥1
Parameter description: Command to execute
bash:
Execute bash command (on Windows system will execute cmd command)
Number of parameters: ≥1
Parameter description: Command to execute
version:
Display interpreter version (Wine Runner version)
Number of parameters: 0
Parameter description: None
thank:
Display acknowledgment list
Number of parameters: 0
Parameter description: None
pause:
Continue after pressing Enter
Number of parameters: 0
Parameter description: None
download:
Download file using aria2
Number of parameters: ≥1 && ≤3
Parameter description: Download URL + Save folder + Save filename
installdxvk:
Install dxvk to specified container
Number of parameters: 0
Parameter description: None
createbotton:
Create container in specified directory
Number of parameters: 0
Parameter description: None
reg:
Import .reg file
Number of parameters: 1
Parameter description: reg file path
enabledopengl:
Enable OpenGL
Number of parameters: 0
Parameter description: None
disbledopengl:
Disable OpenGL
Number of parameters: 0
Parameter description: None
winecfg:
Display 'Wine Settings'
Number of parameters: 0
Parameter description: None
winver:
Display 'About Wine'
Number of parameters: 0
Parameter description: None
changeversion:
Change Wine container system version (not implemented)
Number of parameters: None
Parameter description: None
cat:
Display specified file (only supports displaying files encoded in UTF-8)
Number of parameters: 1
Parameter description: None
enabledhttpproxy:
Set proxy for specified container
Number of parameters: 2
Parameter description: Proxy server address + Port
disbledhttpproxy:
Disable proxy for specified container
Number of parameters: 0
Parameter description: None
enabledwinecrashdialog:
Enable Wine container program crash prompt window
Number of parameters: 0
Parameter description: None
disbledwinecrashdialog:
Disable Wine container program crash prompt window
Number of parameters: 0
Parameter description: None
disbledWinebottlecreatelink:
Prevent Wine container from generating shortcuts
Number of parameters: 0
Parameter description: None
enabledWinebottlecreatelink:
Allow Wine container to generate shortcuts
Number of parameters: 0
Parameter description: None
killall:
Kill specified process
Number of parameters: 1
Parameter description: Process name
control:
Open Control Panel
Number of parameters: 0
Parameter description: None
taskmgr:
Open Task Manager
Number of parameters: 0
Parameter description: None
killallwineserver:
Kill all Wine programs
Number of parameters: 0
Parameter description: None
installvb:
Install specified VB runtime library to specified container
Number of parameters: 1
Parameter description: Number in Visual Basic Runtime installation tool, such as 4 for Visual Basic Runtime Visual Basic 6
installother:
Install uncategorized runtime library to specified container
Number of parameters: 1
Parameter description: Number in other runtime library installation tool, such as 2 for MFC runtime library
decompressionbottle:
Extract container from wine-packaged deb package to specified path
Number of parameters: 2
Parameter description: deb package path + Path to extract to
programforum:
Open program forum
Number of parameters: 0
Parameter description: None
installmsi:
Install MSI file to specified container
Number of parameters: 1
Parameter description: msi file path
installapk:
Install APK file to Waydroid
Number of parameters: 1
Parameter description: apk file path
